provider.name: Alexandria
provider.description: A collection of databases from the group of Prof Miguel A. L. Marques at Ruhr University Bochum.

structures.name: xc_functional
structures.description: The exchange-correlation functional used for the default values.

structures.name: energy
structures.description: The computed total energy of the structure.

structures.name: hull_distance
structures.description: The distance that this structure lies from the global convex hull spanned by all other structures.

structures.name: formation_energy_per_atom
structures.description: The formation energy of the structure, computed versus the elemental chemical potentials.

structures.name: band_gap
structures.description: The computed band gap of the structure.

structures.name: band_gap_direct
structures.description: The computed direct band gap of the structure.

structures.name: band_gap_indirect
structures.description: The computed indirect band gap of the structure.

structures.name: prototype_id
structures.description: The prototype ID used to create the structure.

structures.description: The formation energy of the structure, computed versus the elemental chemical potentials.
